title: Curly type font...need to know name
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522153341im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ap002wiw_3566.jpg)
Need to know name for this font
author: artslons

comments.content: The bad rasterization makes it difficult to say for sure but this is almost certainly not a font but someone’s digitized handwriting. None of the repeated letters are the same, and the baseline is somewhat bouncy and uneven.

Looks like [Melanie](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522153341/http:/www.identifont.com/show?2CH) from Holly Goldsmith.

_»Melanie a handwritting font named after the beautiful, fun-loving, playful eight-year-old daughter of the designer, Holly Goldsmith.«_
You’re right, it’s Melanie. I was fooled by the bad rasterization...
